 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבַצֶּלֶת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==meadow-saffron== or ==crocus== (***colchicum autumnale***, [[BDB#Linn|Linn]].) (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, see GES<sup>Comm. [[Isa.35.1|Isa 35:1]]</sup> [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>p. 174, No. 128</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—abaƒillatu***</u></abbr> VR<sup>32, 62</sup> is a marsh-plant, reed; compare [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>BP 59</sup> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HA 34</sup>; [[Prov.82|Prov 82]] also [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>l.c. and critical note</sup>.); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁרוֺן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺשַׁנַּת הָעֲמָקִים‎</span> [[Song.2.1|Song 2:1]] (figurative of Shulamite), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתָגֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבָה וְתִפְרַח כַּחֲבַצָּֽלֶת׃‎</span> [[Isa.35.1|Isa 35:1]] (***narcissus*** [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>[[Isa.35.1|Isa 35:1]]</sup> compare Conder<sup>PEF, 1878, 46</sup> [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB 476</sup> and others)
